articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: I Am Addicted To ‘The First Descendant,’ It Is A Problem - Forbes
articles.description: When you get past the muck of The First Descendant it has somehow created one of the most compelling, most addicting endgame loot grinds I have ever seen.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: These Two U.S. Cities Are The Most Vulnerable To Severe Space Weather - Forbes
articles.description: Washington, D.C. and Milwaukee power grids are the most at risk from space weather, and there is the potential for widespread infrastructure damage, says new research.
